topic.title: testpre
topic.shortdesc: This should test most I mean all of the attributes on <pre>.

body.pre: <xsl:message> <xsl:text>This is a message. Please continue testing.</xsl:text> </xsl:message>

body.p: Now, with scale=120, frame=all, expanse=page, outputclass=preclass.

topic.title: Everything in a pre
topic.shortdesc: This topic will test putting anything and everything in to a pre.

body.pre: First test basic text. Then, go in to the phrasey stuff. apiname: test apiname bold: test bold boolean: (test boolean ->) cite: test cite test cmdname test codeph test draft-comment test filepath test footnote test italic test indexterm test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph test option test parmname test ph testing a quote test required-cleanup (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top
